name: Kriscol
text:
Kriscol
Kriscol was a resident of the New Fat Trout Trailer Park in Twin Peaks, Washington.
Kriscol performed various maintenance services for other tenants, free of charge. To make money, he would sell his own plasma. This eventually prompted Carl Rodd to confront Kriscol, asking that he begin charging for his jobs while also giving him fifty dollars and a month of free rent.
